availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Galbraith (Christian County and Hickman County , KY, farmer )

body.p: Christian County and Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Henry Galbraith and Sarah Galbraith. Student in Christian County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Moscow in 1860. Household owned two enslaved persons in Moscow in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1, p. 429B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Moscow p. 453.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Moscow p. 204A.
